comment:
LED fixture:A type of lighting fixture that uses Light Emitting Diodes (LEDs) as the source of light. LED lights are known for their energy efficiency and long lifespan.
fluorescence lamp:A type of lighting fixture that uses fluorescence to produce light. Fluorescent lamps are known for their brightness and relatively low cost.
units of electricity:A measure of electrical energy consumption. In this context, it refers to the amount of electricity consumed by each type of light per hour.
